reviews.title: Sand Pebble Resort Very Nice
Friendly, clean and on the beach
reviews.text: *It's right on the beach and it's a good beach.

likes.liked: — so close to beach swimming pool everything about it

reviews.text: My husband, 3 year old daughter and I stayed at this resort last summer for a weekend & really liked the resort. The unit was clean, staff very friendly and the location is perfect. We loved the pool and Jacuzzi and even witnessed a beach wedding one evening at sunset. (Gorgeous!)
reviews.title: This resort Exceeded my Expectations

likes.disliked: — Nothing - aside from maybe the elevator

reviews.text: I would definitely recommend it for families with children as the pool was a big hit & you really can’t beat the location.
reviews.title: beautiful beach but Sand Pebble a little rundown
location, loacation,location
reviews.text: We booked through a timeshare exchange with RCI in December. Town looks like it was stuck in the 60's but the beach itself is the big draw. Beautiful sunsets, great shell collecting for kids... but hotel itself is pretty rundown and in dire need of renovation. Furnishings in unit were really old, pull out couch unuseable due to broken springs etc but kitchen well stocked and unit large. Bring your own towels, these were so old and threadbare I would rather use to dry off my car not my body. Front desk help soooo nice and helpful and I don't agree with statement about not kid-friendly. They were so nice to my son we never had any problems. Lots of kids there. Had basketball court and volleyball on beach which was nice. All places down there seem pretty much the same, older and rundown but the beach is the main attraction anyway.
